channel.title: Hugo on Analysing genetic data
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Analysing genetic data

item.title: Setting up the Blogdown website
item.description: To set up this website I have used some excellent material around blogdown, github and hugo. Motivation Before going into the technical details, let me say something about motivation and inspiration. For me, it definitely helped to read the blogpost by David Robinson, being encouraged by Maëlle Salmon and seeing many others leading by example (among many: Marie Christine Dussault or Kasia Kulma). I might get into a more personal motivation in a future blogpost.
